title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: Near this spot is the secluded burying-ground of Lindean.

title: Memoirs of the life of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Lockhart, J. G.
snippet: At the sight of certain objects — for example, in passing the green foundations of the little chapel of Lindean, where the body of the ' Dark Knight of Liddesdale ' was deposited, on its way to Melrose, — it would, I suppose, have been impossible for him, unless with a companion hopelessly unsusceptible or preoccupied, to forbear some passing  comment, some harping (if the word may be favourably used) on the tradition of the place.
